name: Eren Yeager
description: The determined protagonist of Attack on Titan, driven by a desire for freedom and vengeance.

name: Mikasa Ackerman
description: A quiet and stoic soldier, fiercely loyal to Eren and an exceptionally skilled fighter.

name: Levi Ackerman
description: Humanity's Strongest Soldier, known for his impeccable combat skills and stern demeanor.

name: Sasha Blouse
description: A lively and impulsive soldier with a strong love for food, often providing comic relief.

name: Connie Springer
description: A friendly and somewhat impulsive soldier, often seen alongside Sasha and Jean.

name: Jean Kirschtein
description: A pragmatic and initially self-centered soldier who gradually grows into a reliable leader.

name: Reiner Braun
description: A dedicated soldier with a strong sense of duty, carrying a heavy burden of secrets.

name: Armin Arlert
description: An intelligent and strategic mind, often providing crucial insights despite his initial timidness.

name: Zeke Yeager
description: Eren's half-brother, a complex and influential figure with his own vision for the world.

name: Dot Pixis
description: The eccentric and highly capable commander of the Southern Division of the Garrison Regiment.

name: Kageyama Shigeo
description: A seemingly ordinary middle schooler with immense psychic powers, often struggling to control his emotions.

name: Arataka Reigen
description: A self-proclaimed psychic and con artist who acts as Mob's mentor, despite having no real psychic abilities.

name: Teruki Hanazawa
description: Another powerful esper who initially opposes Mob but later becomes his ally.

name: Dimple
description: A powerful evil spirit who becomes Mob's companion and sometimes his dubious advisor.

name: Ritsu Kageyama
description: Mob's younger brother, intelligent and initially lacking psychic powers, but later develops them.
